Notes: A mysteious slime found on the stairs of the main hall.
It starts as a puddle near the manager's Office
Peculiar smell, makes me think twice if I should lick it...
It seems Park slipped on it and fell down because of it...
Tentative Weapon
A weird chicken made of strong glass & diamonds... Seems expensive.
Licked the Chicken, it seems to have a vague taste of blood...
I has some dents on it, it looks like it fell or hit something hard.
Potential Weapon
It's a love letter from Ruru found in Park's Drawer:
Dear Park
My love for you is bigger than the universe, I would do anything for you... Anything!
Even kill, that's the strength of my love.
A recording of a conversation between Park & Lee
- Lee: It will be fun!
- Park: You know I don't like wearing jewerly
- Lee: It's to celebrate todays event.
- Park: Still, I don't see the point on wearing it the whole day.
- Lee: If Jung sees you he will probably be pissed...
- Park: ... Really? Haha if that's the case let's do it!
- Lee: Remember... Don't take it off
Park's cellphone with a selfie, he seems to be wearing a Pin on his jacket, the position of that Pin matches the place of the injury on his chest
An Exclusive Deluxe Super Hyper Extra Legacy Rare Pin Edition...
Who comes up with the names for these things... It's really expensive.
There's no trace of Park's blood on this Pin... Weird
Possible Weapon
A copy of the first Pin
It's dented on one of it's corners and it has some trails of Park's blood.
There's poison on it's needle, why is there a fake Pin?
Feasible Weapon!
Magnificent key for the Recording Studio Room.

This is the Manager's Office
I can feel the oppressive air of order and power here.
Command and hierarchy can be tasted in everycorner of this place.
There's a strange air of conflict and agitation here...

The main hall of the studio.
This is where Park's body was found and it seems to be the place were he died.
It is a pretty elegant place filled with lots of stuff of the band, Trophies & Posters.

Dressroom huh? Look's more like a dark cave where darkness is bred.
There's some interesting stuff from the band members here.
There might be some clues around here.
The record studio.
I wonder why was this place locked?
It looks very cool though there's a strange scent...
Where have I sensed it... I wonder.
Tough guy. Dislikes Park and doesn't think much of the others.
Pretty agressive sometimes...
He has been wandering around the studio a lot...
So he stole the fake Pin from Park's body, is he innocent?
Orderly and rational, clearly the adult of the group.
She actually hit Park... Violent when enraged.
An office affair with Park, quite unexpected.
She's very wary of Ruru
Wonder if she will be okay raising her baby.
Curious little girl... a bit creepy when angered.
Strong animosity towards Assatari.. No wonder.
She's in shock for being part of Park's death
She's in delusion, her mind is breaking...
She's resentful and spiteful. She's dangerous
The loss of his friend has affected him a lot...
Aimless and nihilistic, poor guy.
The paranoia is taking over his mind...
Must pay attention, this guy is planning something
He has something to do with those Pins
Dead, was it an accident, a suicide or a murder?
Some of the bruises were caused by the Diamondo Chicken
He slipped on Rurus sweat, maybe the fall killed him
He's turned purple, why? Is it poison?
He was poisoned through the sting on his chest!
